source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var> in Porta Praetoria finds you well.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>殿ではないか。
ポルタ・プレトリアについて、何か知りたいことがあるかな？

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_001<tab>An honor and a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What brings you all the way to Porta Praetoria on this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_001我らが解放者、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿ではないか！
よくぞ、ポルタ・プレトリアにお越しくださった！
何か知りたいことがあるかな？
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_010<tab>Fight for the Ala Mhigan Resistance, what else? I was but a child when I fled the city with my parents, and I remember little of life before the Garleans came...but I still see her streets in my dreams.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_010俺はソーンド・クロウ、解放軍の闘士だ。
幼少期に両親に連れられ、アラミゴを去ってからというもの、
帝国からの祖国奪還を夢見て、日夜、鍛錬を積んできた。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_011<tab>Those memories are what brought me here. Though a part of me never thought we'd make it this far! I mean, by Rhalgr, we're within spitting distance of Cotter's citadel! We're almost there. We're almost home...
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_011そして、とうとうここまでやってきた……
あなたにも見えるだろう、あのアラミゴの城塞が！
祖国の奪還まで、あと僅かだ……！

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_020<tab>Protect and serve Ala Mhigo, what else? I was but a child when I fled the city with my parents, and I remember little of life before the Garleans came...but I still see her streets in my dreams.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_020俺はソーンド・クロウ、解放軍の闘士だ。
幼少期に両親に連れられ、アラミゴを去ってからというもの、
帝国からの祖国奪還を夢見て、日夜、鍛錬を積んできた。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_021<tab>Those memories are what brought me here. Though a part of me never thought we'd make it this far! I mean, by Rhalgr, we actually beat the bastards! Zenos and the lot of them! It's like something out of a song...
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_021そして遂に、皆と力を合わせ、悲願を成し遂げたのだ！
これで、散っていった同胞たちも報われるというものよ……！

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_030<tab>Porta Praetoria? Our last camp before Ala Mhigo, and the point of entry to Castrum Abania. Though I reckon you know that since you came through there.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_030ここはポルタ・プレトリア。
カストルム・アバニアの正門にあたる場所だ。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_031<tab>This passage between the Peaks and the Lochs has always held strategic importance, but it was the Garleans who went and built a bloody fortress right on top of it.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_031本来は、アラミゴに至る街道上に置かれた関所だったのだが、
帝国に支配されてからは、連中の拠点に組み込まれてしまった。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_032<tab>Though it's our fortress now, heh heh, along with all her supplies! We've more than enough to sustain us through our assault on the city!
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_032だが、同盟軍の協力もあり、
ようやく我等の手に取り戻すことができた。
このまま勢いに乗って、アラミゴを解放してみせようぞ！

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_040<tab>Porta Praetoria? The last stop before Ala Mhigo, and the point of entry to Castrum Abania. Though I reckon you know that since you came through there.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_040ここはポルタ・プレトリア。
カストルム・アバニアの正門にあたる場所だ。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_041<tab>This passage between the Peaks and the Lochs has always held strategic importance, but it was the Garleans who went and built a bloody fortress right on top of it.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_041本来は、アラミゴに至る街道上に置かれた関所だったのだが、
帝国に支配されてからは、連中の拠点に組み込まれてしまった。

source: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_042<tab>I suppose we ought to thank 'em, eh? It'll come in handy should we need to repel another invasion. But let's all hope it doesn't come to that any time soon.
target:
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_042だが今や、再び我らの拠点へと返り咲いた。
これからは、かつてのように街道の安全を守り、
都市に向かう人々を迎えるための関所となることだろう。
